channel.title: Problems with custom items
channel.description:
see thing is.
when a custom is wielded, it's put into the weapon slot, regardless of which item it is.
my items' models are stored in the client cache, so it cant be client sided
i've put all custom item ID's in the servers item.java AND item4.java in the correct ints
what else is there to do?

item.title: Problems with custom items
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“s3x 4 u l1f3, post:2, topic:307037”]rename and re id it
my statius pllegs are 9800 and its on wepon slot i re ID it to 1069 and now its work:)[/quote]
dude gtfo… u don’t know wat ur on about so just stfu unless u know

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with custom items
item.dc:creator: @winlose winlose
item.description:
@winlose wrote:

what you do is this:
say you have an item like a void knight top
take the id of the idem lets say 2520.
ok?
next open your Item.java
and add that item id to the correct list + if its platebody, add it to body and platebody…
for a helm put it under, hats, fullhelms, and fullmasks…
i hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with custom items
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

owndscape:

Trent renaming it wont matter just try changing the id for it in everything. If its still going in the item spot then you have messed up somewhere and put the code for it in the wrong place.

considering all i had to do was put the item ID’s into the correct ints?
i can’t have messed the code up

Read full topic
